com.laughingmasq.pong.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.laughingmasq.pong.graphics.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BallSprite, LeftPadSprite, RightPadSprite

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for all sprites. Defines draw() method but doesn't implement. Stores the given entity. There is no sprite that has no corresponding entity (yet at least). All sprites should work through this super class.
    Author:
    schme
